name: Student Screen Recorder
description: Record screen and upload to GitHub after login with Firebase GitHub Auth.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; frame-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://github.com https://*.github.com https://*.githubusercontent.com https://*.firebaseapp.com
